Each solution enhanced LiHAâ€™s stability, scalability, and overall user experience.Internal Mobility1. Enhanced Recruiter with advanced Internal Jobs features.2. Implemented authorization for Internal Mobility packages.Self Removal of Users1. Developed the Self Removal feature (Backend) in Recruiter, allowing users/admins to self-remove from contracts, triggering email notifications to admins.2. Led Backend Implementation for Job Collections.2. Collaborated with multiple teams to enhance the Internal Job Board with new job collections similar to LinkedIn Job Collections.

honors_and_awards.description: â€¢ Recipient of INSPIRE Scholarship â€¢ INSPIRE Scholarship for Higher Education (SHE) is a scholarship program implemented by the Department of Science and Technology (DST), Government of India. â€¢ It is a scholarship scheme that comes under Innovation in Science Pursuit for Inspired Research (INSPIRE), a flagship program of DST. â€¢ INSPIRE Scholarship offers 10,000 scholarships every year.
